00020 #ifndef CGIEXCEPTION_H
00021 #define CGIEXCEPTION_H
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 #include <stdexcept>
00026 
00027 using std::string;
00028 using std::ostream;
00029 
00033 class CGIException : public std::runtime_error{
00034         private:
00035                 string mErrMsg;
00036         public:
00037     CGIException(const string& errMsg);
00038                 CGIException(const string& from, const string& errStr);
00039     virtual ~CGIException() throw();
00040                 const string& getMsg() const{
00041                         return mErrMsg;
00042                 }
00043                 friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& o, CGIException& ex);
00044 };
00045 
00046 class FileNotReadableException : public CGIException{
00047         protected:
00048                 string fileName;
00049         public:
00050                 FileNotReadableException(const string& file);
00051                 FileNotReadableException(const string& errForm, const string& file);
00052                 FileNotReadableException(const string& errForm, const string& errStr, const string& file);
00053                 virtual ~FileNotReadableException() throw();
00054                 const string& getFileName() const;
00055 };
00056 
00057 class FileNotWritableException : public CGIException{
00058         protected:
00059                 string fileName;
00060         public:
00061                 FileNotWritableException(const string& file);
00062                 FileNotWritableException(const string& errForm, const string& file);
00063                 FileNotWritableException(const string& errForm, const string& errStr, const string& file);
00064                 virtual ~FileNotWritableException() throw();
00065                 const string& getFileName() const;
00066 };
00067 
00068 class SessionFileNotReadable : public FileNotReadableException{
00069         public:
00070                 SessionFileNotReadable(const string& file);
00071 };
00072 
00073 class SessionFileNotWritable : public FileNotWritableException{
00074         public:
00075                 SessionFileNotWritable(const string& file);
00076 };
00077 
00078 class SessionDataNotWritable : public FileNotWritableException{
00079         public:
00080                 SessionDataNotWritable(const string& file);
00081 };
00082 
00083 class SessionDataNotReadable : public FileNotReadableException{
00084         public:
00085                 SessionDataNotReadable(const string& file);
00086 };
00087 
00088 class SessionFileNotParsable : public FileNotReadableException{
00089         public:
00090                 SessionFileNotParsable(const string& file);
00091 };
